title: 手贱试了一下无敌盔甲架
author: 柳卿辰
txt_content: 如题，然后就这样了。/kill @e[name=欢迎来到基友生存服~~~] 。kill @e[type=armor_stand,name=&6&l欢迎来到基友生存服~~~]  我都试了，找不到或不存在。求大佬支招

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
柳卿辰 发表于 2020-6-19 17:05
无效的选择器参数：limit=1
那就把limit删了

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
中文名需要加引号""
/kill @e[name="欢迎来到基友生存服~~~"]复制代码

replies.author: 柳卿辰
PercyDan
破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content:
/kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,nbt={Invulnerable:1b,CustomName:'{"text":"欢迎来到基友生存服~~~"}'}]
用nbt找你的盔甲架

replies.author: 柳卿辰
柳卿辰
PercyDan
柳卿辰
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-6-19 17:02
/minecraft:kill @e[type=armor_stand,r=3,limit=1]
无效的选择器参数：limit=1

replies.author: 柳卿辰
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-6-19 17:06
那就把limit删了
好了哇66666666666
